before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fldoo","text":"In order to participate in this tutorial, you will need some prerequisites and materials that are described in the Materials section of this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":150},{"style":"bold","offset":115,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"esuit","text":"In particular, before you start you will need to download the following example metadata files:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":95}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b6at9","text":"Microscope.JSON file: A file that contains a description of the hardware components of an example microscope.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":109},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4r68j","text":"Settings.JSON file: A file that contains a description of the settings that were used to acquire the example image data file.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":125},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cr3jl","text":"Raw-image data file: An image data file that was acquired using the hardware specifications and acquisition settings described in the Microscope.JSON and Settings.JSON files.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":174},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1fk6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ap8b4","text":"For quality, interpretation, reproducibility, and sharing value,  microscopy images should be accompanied by detailed descriptions of the conditions that were used to produce them. Micro-Meta App is an intuitive, highly interoperable, open-source software tool that was developed in the context of the 4D Nucleome (4DN) consortium and is designed to facilitate the extraction and collection of relevant microscopy metadata as specified by the recent 4DN-BINA-OME  tiered-system of Microscopy Metadata specifications. In addition to substantially lowering the burden of quality assurance, the visual nature of the Micro-Meta App makes it particularly suited for training purposes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1msut","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3vne1","text":"In this protocol and in the associated videos (https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLd2SsBj4SIsh7eE1M7l4v5_EsjUQcsfb0) you will learn how to get started using the Micro-Meta App for documenting your imaging experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":68}],"data":[]},{"key":"6s5vh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6pp31","text":"Want to learn more?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"edasi","text":"Please watch Video 1 of the Tutorial Series and read the publications listed in the References section of this protocol to learn more about the Micro-Meta App and the underlying 4DN-BINA-OME tiered system of Microscopy Metadata specifications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":84,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":7},{"key":2,"offset":28,"length":15}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BBA16F5FC5F211EC9FE10A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLd2SsBj4SIsh7eE1M7l4v5_EsjUQcsfb0"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"68B4E360C5F411EC9014EDA7AD93F622","url":"https://youtu.be/0lkPzbdmuPc"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"75F31600C5F411EC9014EDA7AD93F622","url":"https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLd2SsBj4SIsh7eE1M7l4v5_EsjUQcsfb0"}}}}
